definitions.text: (physics) a deformation of an object in which parallel planes remain parallel but are shifted in a direction parallel to themselves
examples: the shear changed the quadrilateral into a parallelogram

definitions.text: a large edge tool that cuts sheet metal by passing a blade through it
cut or cut through with shears
examples: shear the wool off the lamb

definitions.text: become deformed by forces tending to produce a shearing strain
